mapper.select: select vt.idx ,vt.sabun ,pi.USER_NM ,pi.TEAM_NM ,vt.user_position ,vt.assigned_tsk ,vt.bsns_tkvr ,vt.vacation_type ,vt.vacation_cont ,vt.vacation_stt ,vt.vacation_end ,vt.emrgn_num ,pi2.USER_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(vt.regdate, '%Y.%m.%d') as regdate FROM vacation_tbl vt LEFT OUTER JOIN person_info pi ON vt.sabun = pi.sabun LEFT OUTER JOIN person_info pi2 ON vt.reviewers = pi2.sabun WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.insert: insert into vctpayment_tbl( idx , reviewers , revreturn , reviewaiting , review_cont ) values( #{idx}, #{user_name}, #{revappro}, 'D', #{review_cont} )
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(vt.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as regdate ,pi.TEAM_NM as team_nm ,CONCAT(pi.USER_NM, " ", vt.user_position ) as sabun ,CONCAT(pi2.USER_NM, " ", cc.DC ) as approv FROM vacation_tbl vt LEFT OUTER JOIN person_info pi ON vt.sabun = pi.sabun LEFT OUTER JOIN person_info pi2 ON vt.approver = pi2.sabun left outer join common_code cc on pi2.USER_POSITION = cc.CODE WHERE reviewaiting = 'N' limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
